low_kick.name: Low Kick
low_kick.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

karate_chop.name: Karate Chop
karate_chop.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

double_kick.name: Double Kick
double_kick.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

jump_kick.name: Jump Kick
jump_kick.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.
effects: user takes recoil damage if move misses

rolling_kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling_kick.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

high_jump_kick.name: High Jump Kick
high_jump_kick.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.
effects: user takes heavy recoil damage if move misses

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

seismic_toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic_toss.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
effects: deals damage equal to user's level

submission.name: Submission
submission.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
